field.name: studieslisttemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_STUDIES_LIST
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: sermonstemplate
field.label: JBS_TPL_SERMONS_TEMPLATE
field.query: SELECT id, type, filename FROM #__bsms_templatecode WHERE type=1 AND published =1 ORDER BY filename ASC

field.name: detailstemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_STUDY_DETAIL
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: sermontemplate
field.label: JBS_TPL_SERMON_TEMPLATE
field.query: SELECT id, type, filename FROM #__bsms_templatecode WHERE type=2 AND published =1 ORDER BY filename ASC

field.name: teachertemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_TEACHER
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: teachertemplate
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEACHER_TEMPLATE
field.query: SELECT id, type, filename FROM #__bsms_templatecode WHERE type=4 AND published =1 ORDER BY filename ASC

field.name: teacherstemplate
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEACHER_LIST_TEMPLATE
field.query: SELECT id, type, filename FROM #__bsms_templatecode WHERE type=3 AND published =1 ORDER BY filename ASC

field.name: serieslisttemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_SERIES_LIST
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: seriesdisplaystemplate
field.label: JBS_TPL_SERIES_LIST_TEMPLATE
field.query: SELECT id, type, filename FROM #__bsms_templatecode WHERE type=5 AND published =1 ORDER BY filename ASC

field.name: seriesdetailtemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_SERIES_DETAIL
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: seriesdisplaytemplate
field.label: JBS_TPL_SERIES_TEMPLATE
field.query: SELECT id, type, filename FROM #__bsms_templatecode WHERE type=6 AND published =1 ORDER BY filename ASC

field.name: series_id
field.query: SELECT #__bsms_series.id AS sid, #__bsms_series.series_text, #__bsms_series.published AS srpub, #__bsms_studies.series_id, #__bsms_studies.published AS spub FROM #__bsms_series LEFT JOIN #__bsms_studies ON ( #__bsms_studies.id = #__bsms_series.id ) WHERE #__bsms_series.published = 1
field.label: JBS_CMN_FILTERS_SERIES

field.name: booknumber
field.query: SELECT booknumber, bookname FROM #__bsms_books WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY booknumber ASC
field.label: JBS_CMN_FILTERS_BOOKS

field.name: templatecode
field.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{date}}
{{studyintro}} {{scripture}}
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATECODE

field.name: teacher_templatecode
field.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{teacher}}
{{short}} {{information}}
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEACHERLIST_TEMPLATECODE

field.name: teacher_detailtemplate
field.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{teacher}}
{{short}} {{information}}
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEACHERDETAIL_TEMPLATECODE
